nodes.text: The Narmle Swamp was a swamp on the Nabooian moon of Rori. The swamp was located between the Lake Octir Swamp and the Narmle Bog. It was named after the city of Narmle that was built in the swamp.

The Narmle Swamp first appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Its name was revealed in the description of the city of Nashal that was shown to players on the screen that allowed them to choose the starting location for a new character. These description texts were removed when Mos Eisley was made the starting city for all players with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
